effect.name: Video Noise Generator
effect.description: Add noise on video input frame
effect.author: libavfilter

parameter.name: av.allf
Type
parameter.comment:
Available noise types:
  • Averaged temporal noise (smoother)
  • Mix random noise with a (semi)regular pattern
  • Temporal noise (noise pattern changes between frames)
  • Uniform noise (Gaussian otherwise)
parameter.paramlistdisplay: Averaged temporal noise,Mix random noise,Temporal noise,Uniform noise
